use_cases_desc: Map application, notification management system, multitasking manager, music player, video chat
evaluation: Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc:
The paper explores techniques for distributing a user interface across phone and smartwatch based on context. Here context is how the phone and watch is held, pocketed or placed. The paper identifies 14 contexts, and describes what types of interactions are possible in the given contexts. 
The paper presents a machine-learning based context recogniser, and evaluate the recogniser using different classifiers in a controlled study. An accuracy of up to 90% is achieved.
tracking_characteristic: Tracking devices only; Orientation; Acceleration; Inside-out tracking
device_models: SONY Xperia Z3 Compact SO-02G; SONY SmartWatch 3 SWR50
